headline.main: France's Fillon Under Fire as Party Chiefs Bring Forward Crisis Meeting
headline.print_headline: France's Fillon Under Fire as Party Chiefs Bring Forward Crisis Meeting

lead_paragraph: Embattled French presidential candidate Francois Fillon was under growing pressure to quit the race on Saturday as his party leaders brought forward a meeting to discuss the situation and former allies shied away from a planned rally to support him.
